headline.main: FBI Probes Involve 300 People Admitted to U.S. as Refugees: Congressional Sources
headline.print_headline: FBI Probes Involve 300 People Admitted to U.S. as Refugees: Congressional Sources

lead_paragraph: The FBI is investigating 300 people who were admitted into the United States as refugees as part of 1,000 counterterrorism investigations involving Islamic State or individuals inspired by the militant group, congressional sources told Reuters on Monday, citing senior administration officials.
